meanings.definition: A traditional Jewish dish made of noodles or potatoes
meanings.sent1: My grandma makes the best kugel for our family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The kugel at the potluck was delicious and comforting.
meanings.sent3: When the kugel accidentally fell on the floor, we all laughed.
meanings.sent4: The kugel was a warm hug on a cold winter evening.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the baking kugel filled the kitchen with happiness.

meanings.definition: A round ball or sphere, especially in reference to a toy or game
meanings.sent1: The children played with a colorful kugel in the park.
meanings.sent2: The glass kugel rolled smoothly across the table.
meanings.sent3: The kugel bounced unexpectedly, surprising everyone around.
meanings.sent4: The kugel reflected the sunlight, creating a beautiful rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The kugel was the perfect size for the toddler's tiny hands.

meanings.definition: A type of baked pudding or casserole, typically made with noodles or potatoes
meanings.sent1: The savory kugel was a hit at the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: I love the sweet and creamy kugel my mom makes.
meanings.sent3: The kugel bubbled in the oven, filling the house with a tempting smell.
meanings.sent4: The golden crust of the kugel was irresistible.
meanings.sent5: The kugel was a delightful surprise on the menu.
